event.name: STORAGE_CHECK_TWISTED_FLAK_FORGE_MENU
event.text: What would you like to do?

event.name: FLAK_REDEMPTION
event.text: What kind of flak would you like to craft?

event.name: FLAK_REDEMPTION_NORMAL
event.text: You look deep into the Flak Forge. How many resources are you going to spend?

choice.text: Spend a meager amount of normal flak resource (costs 10 flak point)

event.text: You feed the materials into the forge and wait. Suddenly, a brand new flak weapon is dispensed! It isn't much, but it'll keep you going for sure!

choice.text: Spend a meager amount of normal flak resource (costs 10 flak point)
Spend a small amount of normal flak resource (costs 20 flak points)

event.text: You feed the materials into the forge and wait. After a few minutes, a flak weapon is formed before your very eyes! You prepare to mount it on your ship and move on.

choice.text: Spend a small amount of normal flak resource (costs 20 flak points)
Spend a medium amount of normal flak resource (costs 30 flak points)

event.text: You feed the materials into the forge and wait. After a few minutes, a flak weapon is formed before your very eyes! It's certainly a substantial armament, but you know what the forge is capable of...

choice.text: Spend a medium amount of normal flak resource (costs 30 flak points)
Spend a large amount of normal flak resource (costs 40 flak points)

event.text: You feed the materials into the forge and wait. After a few minutes, a flak weapon is formed before your very eyes! Your crew stare in appreciation at your new prize.

choice.text: Spend a large amount of normal flak resource (costs 40 flak points)
Spend a massive amount of normal flak resource (costs 50 flak points)

event.text: You feed the materials into the forge and wait. You hold you breath in anticipation as the forge reveals the fruits of your efforts. Now THIS... is a weapon.

choice.text: Spend a massive amount of normal flak resource (costs 50 flak points)

event.name: FLAK_REDEMPTION_SPECIAL
event.text: You look deep into the Flak Forge. How many resources are you going to spend?

choice.text: Spend a meager amount of special flak resource (costs 1 special flak point)

event.text: You feed the materials into the forge and wait. Suddenly, a brand new flak weapon is dispensed! It isn't much, but it'll keep you going for sure!

choice.text: Spend a meager amount of special flak resource (costs 10 special flak point)
Spend a small amount of special flak resource (costs 20 special flak points)

event.text: You feed the materials into the forge and wait. After a few minutes, a flak weapon is formed before your very eyes! You prepare to mount it on your ship and move on.

choice.text: Spend a small amount of special flak resource (costs 20 special flak points)
Spend a medium amount of special flak resource (costs 30 special flak points)

event.text: You feed the materials into the forge and wait. After a few minutes, a flak weapon is formed before your very eyes! It's certainly a substantial armament, but you know what the forge is capable of...

choice.text: Spend a medium amount of special flak resource (costs 30 special flak points)
Spend a large amount of special flak resource (costs 40 special flak points)

event.text: You feed the materials into the forge and wait. After a few minutes, a flak weapon is formed before your very eyes! Your crew stare in appreciation at your new prize.

choice.text: Spend a large amount of special flak resource (costs 40 special flak points)
Spend a massive amount of special flak resource (costs 50 special flak points)

event.text: You feed the materials into the forge and wait. You hold you breath in anticipation as the forge reveals the fruits of your efforts. Now THIS... is a weapon.

choice.text: Spend a massive amount of special flak resource (costs 50 special flak points)
